content: When's the next CLI meeting? I feel left out :( lol
It's every month first Monday at 18:00 UTC. https://hackmd.io/NKG9jUiFThGqgAqhsIniyg
Awesome, thanks...I need to add it to my calendar lol
Next meeting is on 6.4.20 at 18:00 UTC. Are you not on the mailing list @Degausser ?
I am not! How can I sign up @dpc
@Degausser You need to be in the team on rust-lang https://github.com/rust-lang/team/blob/master/teams/wg-cli.toml
or in the extra-emails.
Thanks @XAMPPRocky Iâ€™ll put in a PR for that tomorrow morning but it appears woahfully out-of-date though (cc @dpc @Pascal)
that's fine :D
I am the coordinator of the next meeting and I will be sending a reminder a week before and will also be pinging in the chat rooms when the meeting starts :slight_smile:

Nice to meet you @pksunkara I've been in/aroudn the wg-cli for a while and have been maintaining/updating cargo-outdated but want to get more involved with the group and other repos we have. I put the PR to be added to that .toml file this morning :)
Nice to meet you too. I am focusing more on clap (not much this week and next week since I will be busy IRL) trying to get a proper 3.0 release

Reminder that WG CLI monthly meeting is coming Monday, Apr 6 at 18:00 UTC. Here's the agenda, https://hackmd.io/NKG9jUiFThGqgAqhsIniyg?view#Sync-meeting-%E2%80%93-April-2020. Please feel free to add stuff to it.
https://meet.jit.si/Rust-CLI-WG-2020 in 2 minutes
And of course my computer crashes
Idk if this is for the meeting but if someone could approve https://github.com/rust-lang/team/pull/299 that would be awesome :)
Spacekookie approved it. It should be done. :slight_smile:
Yay thanks!!! I wasn't sure if they were in the meeting or not :D
It's still going on, join us
unfortunately my full time job is getting in the way ATM after my computer crashed I need to recompose an email I was working on :(
uh no, don't worry i'll get the PR tracked
Unfortunately I don't have merge rights on the teams repo so all I can do is approve them. Someone from core or infra has to merge I think
Looks like it was merged last night, thank you :)
yeah i had sent the link to Mark who merged it xD
